headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Berkshire Hathaway, Progressive, Chubb, Travelers Companies and Allstate
summary: BRK.B, PGR, CB, TRV and ALL are positioned for growth as tech adoption, pricing power and underwriting drive P&C momentum.

headline: NZS Capital Q2 2025 Shareholder Letter
summary: NZS Capital reports a 19.39% Q2 gain for its Growth Equity strategy. See how resilient tech picks and smart reallocation drove results. Review the playbook.
